SELECT rent_no, car_no, user_id, rent_status, booking_date, start_date, end_date, reserv_pax, add_option, delete_status, merchant_uid, amount , (SELECT user_nick FROM usertb U WHERE U.user_id = R.user_id ) AS guestnick , (SELECT user_id FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no ) AS hostid , (SELECT car_name FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no ) AS carname , (SELECT loc_name_ko FROM location_category L WHERE L.loc_cate = (SELECT location FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as location , (SELECT area_name_ko FROM area_category A WHERE A.area_cate = (SELECT area FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no) AND A.loc_cate = (SELECT location FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as area , (SELECT user_nick FROM usertb U WHERE U.user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM cartb C WHERE C.car_no = R.car_no)) as hostnick , (SELECT stored_name FROM (SELECT stored_name FROM boardfiletb WHERE board_no = R.car_no)) AS thumbnailname
, (SELECT review_no FROM reviewtb RV WHERE R.rent_no = RV.rent_no AND RV.user_id = #{search } AND delete_status = 0) as review
FROM renttb R
